title: MatchActionResponse
description: Response object for match action request

responseMessage.description: Descriptive message detailing the result of the match action

requestType.description: Indicates the type of the request, which should be 'match'

userName_1.description: The username of the white player, who starts the match (Player 1)

userName_2.description: The username of the black player (Player 2), if present

matchAction.description: The type of action that was done to a match

matchID.description: The identifier for the match, can be negative if the match ID is not applicable

fenState.description: Identifies the state of the board in the match
